parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: HttpPort
parameters.description: The HTTP port number (virtual service group).

parameters.name: HttpsPort
parameters.description: The HTTPS port number (virtual service group).

parameters.name: HttpsVServerGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the HTTPS virtual service group.

parameters.name: SlbId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the service source. Valid values:

*   PUB_NET: Internet
*   PRIVATE_NET: VPC

parameters.name: VServerGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the HTTP virtual service group.
